value.unicode:
<tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/> 
 /* CSS Document for vifib */
 /* Global Declaration */
 body {
 font:15px/20px Arial, sans-serif;
 margin:0;
 padding:0;
 }
 
 div, ul, h1, h2, h3, li, p, img{
 margin:0px; padding:0px;
 }
 ul{
 list-style-type:none;
 }
 fieldset {
 border:none;
 }
 fieldset.bottom .field label {
 display: none;
 }
 
 h1 {
 text-decoration : none;
 margin-top : 20px;
 margin-bottom : 20px;
 margin-right : 5px;
 font : 28px/28px "Lucida Grande", sans-serif;
 font-weight : normal;
 color : #aab8dd;
 }
 
 h2 {
 text-decoration : none;
 margin-top : 20px;
 margin-bottom : 20px;
 margin-right : 5px;
 font : 24px/24px "Lucida Grande", sans-serif;
 font-weight : normal;
 color : #aab8dd;
 }
 h2 img {
 margin-left : 5px;
 }
 h4 {
 margin-bottom : 10px;
 margin-top : 10px;
 color : #555;
 font-weight : bold;
 }
 a {
 color:blue;
 }
 select {
 max-width:762px;
 }
 
 label {
 padding-right:10px;
 }
 
 /* Global Class */
 .widget{
 padding:0px; margin:0px;
 }
 
 .nolabel label{
 display:none;
 }
 
 .required label {
 background-image:url(vifib_image/required_mark.png) ;
 background-position:right center ;
 background-repeat:no-repeat;
 }
 
 .inline label {
 display: inline-block;
 width: 200px;
 float:left;
 }
 
 .inline div {
 display:inline;
 }
 
 .error input {
 border-color:red;
 border-style:solid;
 }
 .error {
 color:red;
 }
 .warning {
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 .clear{
 clear: both;
 }
 
 #hidden_fieldset{
 display:none;
 }
 
 /* Image == link */
 img.imglink {
 border : 0 none;
 cursor : pointer;
 }
 
 /* CONTAINER */
 #main_form {
 background-color:#DDD;
 }
 
 #container {}
 
 /* MAIN FILDSET */
 #fieldset_center{
 margin: auto;
 width:560px;
 }
 
 /* TOP PANEL*/
 #topPanel{
 width:100%; 
 height:256px;
 position:relative;
 margin:0px auto;
 padding:0px;
 background-color: #transparent;
 }
 
 /*Header*/
 #header {
 width:762px; 
 margin: auto;
 background: white;
 }
 
 /* Web site logo */
 #logo{
 position:relative;
 border:0 none;
 /* width:762px; */
 }
 /* Language */
 #language_choice{
 float: right;
 }
 #language_choice li{
 width:20px;
 display: inline;
 opacity: 0.5;
 }
 #language_choice li.selected{
 width:20px;
 display: inline;
 opacity: 1;
 }
 
 /* Login bar */
 #topPanel .login_bar {
 float:right;
 margin-right:5px;
 color:#555;
 font:10px/10px Arial, sans-serif;
 }
 #topPanel .login_bar a {
 color:#999999;
 font:10px/10px Arial, sans-serif;
 height:20px;
 border:none;
 text-decoration:None;
 }
 #topPanel .login_bar a:hover{
 color:#555;
 font:10px/10px Arial, sans-serif;
 height:20px;
 font-weight:normal;
 border:none;
 text-decoration:underline;
 cursor:pointer;}
 #topPanel .login_bar img{
 border: 0pt none ;
 height:15px ;
 }
 
 /* Navigation */
 #site_navigation {
 background-color:#116;
 color:white;
 /*font-family:Comic Sans MS;*/
 }
 
 #site_navigation a {
 background-color:transparent;
 color:white;
 font-size:10pt;
 text-decoration:none;
 }
 
 #site_navigation a:hover {
 color:red;
 }
 
 /* Main Panel */
 #mainPanel {
 margin:0px auto;
 padding:0 0 50px;
 width:762px;
 position:relative;
 min-height: 250px;
 margin-top: 20px;
 border-top: 10px solid;
 border-color: #DDD;
 background-color: #FFFFFF;
 }
 /* show status msg if necessary */ 
 #portal_status{
 text-align:center;
 background:#ff950e;
 color:white;
 }
 
 /* main content of the page */
 #main_content {}
 
 #main_content p {
 margin-top: 5px;
 margin-bottom: 5px;
 }
 
 /* Left fieldset (In order tab choose left)*/
 #fieldset_left{
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 }
 
 /* Hidde 'Web Page' title */
 #fieldset_webcontent_header_bottom{
 display: none;
 }
 
 /* Title for section */
 .sectionTitle h1 {
 background:#fff; 
 display:block; 
 margin:0 0 12px 0; 
 font:24px/24px "Gill Sans", sans-serif; 
 font-weight:normal; 
 padding:0;
 color:#ff950e;
 text-decoration:none;
 }
 
 /* Description block for a page */
 .description {
 font-size : 14px;
 color : #555;
 text-align : justify;
 margin-bottom:15px;
 max-width: 762px;
 }
 
 
 /* Action button of dialog */
 #dialog_submit_button{
 float:right;
 position:relative;
 right:170px;
 }
 
 /* Bottom Panel */
 #bottomPanel{
 position:relative;
 width: 100%;
 padding:0;
 background-color: #FFFFFF;
 }
 
 /* FOOTER BOX*/
 
 #footerBox{
 background-color: #4C4C4C;
 color:#FFFFFF;
 font-size:12px;
 font-weight:normal;
 position:relative;
 width:100%;
 height:20px; 
 padding:0px;
 }
 #footerBox a{
 color:#FFFFFF; 
 text-decoration:none;
 }
 
 #footerBox a:hover{
 text-decoration:underline;
 color:#DCDCDC; 
 }
 
 #footerBox div {
 margin:auto;
 width:351px;
 }
 
 #footerBox ul{position:relative; left:127px; top:-19px; }
 #footerBox li{display:inline; font:12px/15px Helvetica, sans-serif; }
 #footerBox ul li a{padding:0 6px; }
 
 
 #footerBox p.copyright{position:relative; top:1px; left:15px; color:#FFFFFF;}
